text: Luther Scott Harshbarger (born December 1, 1941) is an American attorney and Democratic politician. He was the 56th Massachusetts Attorney General from 1991 to 1999. In 1998, he was the Democratic nominee for Governor of Massachusetts, but lost to acting governor Paul Cellucci. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Massachusetts attorneys general Category:Politicians from New Haven, Connecticut Category:Lawyers from Connecticut Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Cambridge, Massachusetts
title: Scott Harshbarger
